designSystemProfile.name: Modern SaaS Signup Form
designSystemProfile.description: A design system for a clean, modern, and professional user authentication screen (signup/login). The design uses a prominent two-column card layout to separate branding from functionality, creating an elegant and focused user experience.

style.overallLook: The core of the design is a single, centered card with heavily rounded corners, set against a dark, muted background. The card itself is split into two panels: a dark, atmospheric branding panel on the left and a clean, white functional form panel on the right. A single, vibrant accent color provides strong visual hierarchy for calls-to-action.

typography.fontFamily: A clean, geometric sans-serif font (e.g., Inter, Manrope, Plus Jakarta Sans).

styles.name: display-heading
styles.description: For the large, impactful value proposition text on the dark panel.

styles.name: form-heading
styles.description: For the main heading on the form panel, e.g., 'Get Started'.

styles.description: For the welcome text below the form heading.

styles.description: For labels placed above input fields.

styles.name: button

layout.container: A single, large card is centered both horizontally and vertically within the viewport. The page background is a solid color.
layout.grid: The central card uses a two-column, equal-width layout. The form elements on the right panel are arranged in a single vertical stack with consistent spacing (e.g., 16px-24px) between them.

components.name: authCard
components.description: The main split-panel container for the authentication screen.

style.boxShadow: large, soft shadow to lift the card from the page background.

components.structure: Composed of two panels. The left panel has a 'background-card-secondary' color and contains branding elements. The right panel has a 'background-card-primary' color and contains the user input form. Both panels have significant internal padding.

components.name: form
components.description: The structure of the input form on the right panel.
components.structure: Arranged vertically. Starts with a logo icon, followed by a Form Heading, Form Subheading, a series of input groups, a primary action button, and a final secondary action link.

components.name: inputField
components.description: Standard text input field for the form.

focus.boxShadow: A subtle glow or outline using the accent color.

components.name: textLink
components.description: A link for secondary actions, like navigating to a different form.
components.structure: Typically part of a sentence, e.g., 'Already have an account? Login'.

iconography.style: Minimalist, geometric, and abstract. Single-color, using the primary accent.
iconography.usage: Used as a simple logo mark at the top of the form to establish brand identity without adding clutter.

imagery.style: Abstract and atmospheric. A soft, blurred, vertical light streak effect.
imagery.usage: Used as a non-intrusive background element on the dark branding panel to add a sense of dynamism, technology, and visual interest.
